Reviews.Title: Hardware is good the support is questionable
Reviews.Author: Craig M
Reviews.Content: I setup the system and got the cameras hooked up and all was good.  I went to setup the Internet link and had problems.  It took a while to get to tech support but once I did they did a good job of getting me up and going.  I could see all my cameras from my smart phone anytime anywhere!  2 weeks later they sent out an update to the viewer on my android phone and it doesn't work after installing the upgrade.....  I have done what I can but it looks like a long wait on the phone to tech support again....

Reviews.Title: Night Owl DVR System
Reviews.Author: John Mayberry
Reviews.Content: I have a 8 channel DVR 500G system works great customer survive is great no problems, it has been running 24/7 for 2 years.I am going to up grade to a 16 channel and it will be Night Owl.
